sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for operating the tablet compression machine.
sections.scope: Applicable to tablet manufacturing practicals in the Pharmaceutics laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the machine is clean and free from previous residues.
Install punches and dies of required size.
Set compression force and fill depth.
Switch ON the machine and begin compression.
Collect tablets and check for defects.
After completion, clean the machine thoroughly.
sections.precautions: Do not place hands near moving parts. Ensure proper lubrication before operation.
